name: @roadwork/dapr-js-sdk-example-hello-world
description: An example utilizing the Dapr JS SDK

scripts.start:dapr: TEST_SECRET_1=secret_val_1 TEST_SECRET_2=secret_val_2 dapr run --app-id example-hello-world --app-protocol http --app-port 50051 --dapr-http-port 50050 --components-path ./components npm run start
